OrgName: News Corporation and its wholly owned subsidiary NC Transaction Inc.
PPLoc: The policy is located on intranet sites available to applicable employees within the organization and/or it is also e-mailed to applicable employees within the organization.
activities: Any Personal Information sent to us may be used by News Corp. for the following purposes: personnel administration (including hiring, promotion, succession planning, talent identification, discipline and termination proceedings, training and career development, and internal investigations); payroll, compensation and incentive decisions; benefits and other human resources administration; public relations and award programs; computer systems access and security; physical facilities entry access and security; to satisfy legal and regulatory requirements; staffing; safety, occupational health and medical records administration; communications; in connection with corporate initiatives; compliance with legal obligations; compliance training and awareness; travel bookings and expense reimbursement; mergers, acquisitions and divestitures; employee collaboration; and ensuring the proper functioning of the employee database.  We will also share Personal Information with our affiliates for the purposes described.

recoursemech: To ensure compliance with the Safe Harbor Principles, News Corporation and its wholly owned subsidiary NC Transaction Inc will commit to: (a) cooperate with those Data Protection Authorities ("DPAs") and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) of EU Member States and Switzerland with jurisdiction in the investigation and resolution of complaints, and comply with appropriate advice given by those DPAs and FDPIC; (b) periodically review and verify the Company's compliance with the Safe Harbor Principles; and (c) remedy issues arising out of any failure to comply with the Safe Harbor Principles.
